# reservationIdentifier

**Instance Property**

An identifier to use when searching for the user’s reservations.

## Declaration

```swift
var reservationIdentifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the system wants to display a specific reservation, this property contains the identifier for that reservation. Use this identifier to fetch only the specified reservation. When this property is `nil`, return all of the user’s current reservations, or those specific to the restaurant listed in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INGetUserCurrentRestaurantReservationBookingsIntent/restaurant] property.

## Getting the Search Parameters

- **restaurant**: A restaurant to use as a filter when searching for reservations.
